Topic.Title: The total PC market is "estimated" to decline by ONLY 1.2% in 2012 vs 2011....

Message.Msg: I think the time is now just before the eanings as we will beat the Rev and Profit.....

Message.Title: dell is under accumulation
Message.Msg: 3x avg volume today. up 3% in down mkt....LBO or merger?

Message.Title: Reasons why DELL is a buy
Message.Msg: -PE of 5.6, with tons of cash and profitting -Don't count the PC makers out yet, Windows 8 will revolutionize laptops/touchpad combo. Just look at the first version of its kind, MSFT surface (being the first with kickstand and detatchable keyboard) isn't pleasing to the eyes. But wait until Dell, HP, or MSFT take another crack at it-- it will be awesome. It will make all the tablets obselete or dirt cheap. -Cheapest since 1997, it is ready for a rebound!
Indeed; quite an aberration today, isn't it? On a day when nearly all tech stocks tanked, including mighty Apple, one wonders why Dell not only held up, it went up 2.94%. Most peculiar!
